Notification required pursuant to ยง 105.7 which is sent to any addressee other than the addressee specified in that subsection will not cause the statutory period of one hundred and eighty (180) days to begin for purposes of an assessment by the Mayor or his or her duly authorized representatives resulting from the adjustment to taxable income.
